context.p: The callback component is called by the PSP after a customer has registered payment information with the PSP. It calls the register method of the PaymentRegistrationService interface which is part of the payment service provided by . The callback component can, for example, be implemented as a servlet.

result.p: The callback component passes the organizationKey, paymentTypeKey, paymentInfoKey, and paymentInfoId parameters, which were provided by the request call, to the register method.
